name: keka
title: Keka
description: Compress and extract files using Keka, the macOS file archiver
author: aone

commands.name: compress-using-keka
commands.title: Compress Files
commands.subtitle: Keka
commands.description: Compress the selected files using Keka

commands.name: extract-using-keka
commands.title: Extract Files
commands.subtitle: Keka
commands.description: Extract the selected files using Keka

commands.name: open-to-keka
commands.title: Open Files
commands.subtitle: Keka
commands.description:
Open the selected files with Keka
Keka will decide whether to compress or extract depending on your configuration and the type of files

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
